meanings.sent1: The painting was undefaced, with no scratches or marks on its surface.
meanings.sent2: The undefaced mirror reflected her clear image without any distortions.
meanings.sent3: The cake remained undefaced even after the children's playful food fight.
meanings.sent4: Her undefaced beauty shone through, untouched by the passage of time.
meanings.sent5: The undefaced landscape was a sight to behold, untouched by human hands.

meanings.definition: Remaining in original condition or unaltered
meanings.sent1: The ancient ruins stood undefaced by modern construction, preserving their historical significance.
meanings.sent2: The undefaced document bore the original signature of the founding father.
meanings.sent3: The undefaced antique clock ticked away the centuries, unchanged in its appearance.
meanings.sent4: His undefaced reputation in the community was a testament to his integrity.
meanings.sent5: The undefaced map guided them through the uncharted territory with accuracy.
